verbs.description: [ARG0: < p > Rudy Giuliani , a lawyer for President Donald Trump ,] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG1: that any interview of Trump by the special counsel investigating alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 U.S. election would be limited in scope and length] , a Washington Post reporter said on Twitter.</p >

< p > Rudy Giuliani , a lawyer for President Donald Trump , said on Wednesday that any interview of Trump by [ARG0: the special counsel] [V: investigating] [ARG1: alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 U.S. election] would be limited in scope and length , a Washington Post reporter said on Twitter.</p >

< p > Rudy Giuliani , a lawyer for President Donald Trump , said on Wednesday that any interview of Trump by the special counsel investigating [V: alleged] [ARG1: Russian meddling] in the 2016 U.S. election would be limited in scope and length , a Washington Post reporter said on Twitter.</p >
